name: S.T.A.R. - Stellar Transport Animal Rebellion
description:
You and your friends are queer animals in space rebelling against alien rock monsters. Teleport rock aliens off your ship. Use Math to solve problems!

This multiplayer isometric point and click action game can be played online with up to 3 other players. It is highly recommended that you use a service like Discord or another voice chat while playing; communication is key.

Made by:

 Atlier Shevmo, J.C. Lumsargis, Kevin Hulse, Melissa Lewis-Gentry, S. Lizak

Find some of their other works at: 

Shevmo.com

Nubbernaut Studios

This game was developed for The 2020 Rainbow Game Jam. It is not a full game. If you want us to add more levels, or you find a bug, leave us a nice comment below! If you're mad about the game because something's not working, head on over here to post a detailed message.
